name: Pelagic Deva
description: The Pelagic Deva is a graceful, celestial creature embodying the ideals of neutrality and goodness, depicted with features resembling the ocean and adorned in Living Coral Armor.
memorable: This deva can polymorph willing creatures into aquatic forms and create an Anoxic Aura to suffocate air-breathing creatures, showcasing its tactical capabilities in aquatic environments.
goals: To protect the seas and aquatic realms while influencing other beings toward neutrality and goodness.
relations: Often interacts with other celestial beings and guardians of nature, may serve deities of the sea or water-related domains.
environment: Typically found in aquatic realms like oceans, rivers, and near coral reefs.
strengths: Possesses powerful magical weapon attacks and high resilience with damage resistance to cold and radiant damage.
weaknesses: Less effective in aerial combat due to limited mobility on land.
attacks: Can make three weapon attacks with its Trident, dealing both piercing and radiant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Transforming Touch allows it to polymorph a willing creature into a giant octopus, hunter shark, or plesiosaurus for strategic advantages.
senses: Possesses a passive Perception score of 19, indicating strong awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in Perception, enhancing its ability to detect threats in its environment.
additional_information: Can breathe both air and water.
Weapon attacks are magical, adding extra radiant damage.
Immortal nature: does not require food, drink, or sleep.
Living Coral Armor can self-repair if damaged.
Has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.
